title: THOUGHT / COACH PHYSICAL INSTRUMENT
description: Physical Instrument is really adamant about yelling at you. something-something triggers the thought

dialogueTree.title: Physical Instrument: "Son, you've really let yourself go..."
dialogueTree.english: Son, you've really let yourself go -- it's a disgrace. But Coach Physical Instrument is going to get you back in prime condition. Even if it takes a million push-ups!
dialogueTree.polish: Synku, naprawdę mocno się zaniedbałeś. To aż hańba. Ale trener ciało jako narzędzie zadba na nowo o twoją kondycję. Choćbyś musiał zrobić milion pompek!
dialogueTree.belarusian: Сынку, ты сапраўды моцна занядбаўся. Гэта нават сорам. Але Трэнер Фізічны Інструмент зноў паклапоціцца пра тваю фізічную форму. Хаця б табе прыйшлося зрабіць мільён адцісканняў!

links.title: You: "Coach Physical Instrument? Does tha..."
links.english: Coach Physical Instrument? Does that mean you'll call me a maggot and a nancy-boy to motivate me?
links.polish: Trener ciało jako narzędzie? To znaczy, że będziesz mnie nazywać robakiem i lalusiem, żeby mnie zmotywować?
links.belarusian: Трэнер Фізічны Інструмент? Гэта значыць, што ты будзеш мяне называць чарвяком і лабусем, каб мяне матываваць?

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Does a master swordsman insult his..."
links.english: Does a master swordsman insult his own blade? No! I'm going to turn you into an athletic bench-mark, you big pussy!
links.polish: Czy mistrz szermierki obraża własne ostrze? Nie! Zmienię cię w atletyczny wzorzec, ty żałosna ciamajdo!
links.belarusian: Ці абражае майстар фехтавання ўласны клінок? Не! Я зменю цябе ў атлетычны ўзор, ты жалюгодная бракавасць!

links.title: You: "Yes sir! Forge me into organic stee..."
links.english: Yes sir! Forge me into organic steel, coach!
links.polish: Tak jest! Zmień mnie w organiczną stal, trenerze!
links.belarusian: Вось так! Змені мяне ў арганічную сталь, трэнеру!

links.title: Physical Instrument: "It's going to take blood, sweat, pi..."
links.english: It's going to take blood, sweat, piss, and tears, but when I'm done with you, boy, you will be a Master Athlete!
links.polish: Wylejesz wiele krwi, potu, szczyn i łez, ale kiedy z tobą skończę, chłopie, będziesz wielkim sportowcem!
links.belarusian: Ты пральеш шмат крыві, поту, мачы і слёз, але калі я з табой скончу, хлопча, ты станеш вялікім спартоўцам!

links.title: Physical Instrument: "When a man sets his mind and body o..."
links.english: When a man sets his mind and body on something and gives his hundred and ten percent, he is sometimes going to piss himself. It just happens. No shame in that.
links.polish: Kiedy człowiek postawi sobie jakiś cel i da z siebie sto dziesięć procent, czasem zdarza mu się zeszczać. Tak bywa. To żaden wstyd.
links.belarusian: Калі чалавек ставіць перад сабой нейкую мэту і аддае сябе напоўніцу, часам здараецца, што ён памыляецца. Гэта здараецца. Гэта не сорам.

links.title: You: "Let's do this, coach, I'm with you!..."
links.english: Let's do this, coach, I'm with you! (Opt in.)
links.polish: Do dzieła, trenerze, jestem z tobą! (Wejdź w to).
links.belarusian: За справу, трэнер, я з табой! (Уваходзь у гэта).

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Behold, world -- here walks a sport..."
links.english: Behold, world -- here walks a sportsman, hands chalked and hair kept back with a bandana. The *homo athleticus!*.
links.polish: Spójrz, świecie. Oto kroczy sportowiec. Na dłoniach ma już talk, a na włosach bandanę. Oto *homo athleticus*!
links.belarusian: Паглядзі, свет. Вось крочыць спартсмен. На руках у яго ўжо ёсць тальк, а на валасах бандана. Вось *homo athleticus*!

links.title: You: "Too much abuse for my taste. I'm mo..."
links.english: Too much abuse for my taste. I'm more of an intellectual. (Opt out.)
links.polish: Coś to dla mnie zbyt agresywne. Ja jestem raczej intelektualistą. (Nie wchodź w to).
links.belarusian: Гэта для мяне занадта агрэсіўна. Я хутчэй інтэлектуал. (Не ўступай у гэта).

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Attention, attention! An old has-be..."
links.english: Attention, attention! An old has-been giving up! Come see the has-been quitting again, everyone!
links.polish: Uwaga, uwaga! Niegdyś silny, dziś się poddaje! Zobaczcie, jak znów się poddaje, ludzie!
links.belarusian: Увага, увага! Колісь моцны, сёння здаецца! Паглядзіце, як зноў здаецца, людзі!

links.title: You: "I'm really, *really* not interested..."
links.polish: Naprawdę, ale to *naprawdę* nie jestem zainteresowany. [Odrzuć myśl].
links.belarusian: Сапраўды, але я *сапраўды* не зацікаўлены. [Адхілі думку].
